content: Hey Everest AI, how are you doing today?
Hello Biwash, I'm doing well, thank you for asking. How can I assist you today?
How's your day been so far?
I don't experience days or time like humans do, but I'm here to help you anytime you need assistance. What can I do for you today?
Hello Biwash, I'm doing great, as always. Ready to assist you with any questions or tasks you have. What do you need help with today?
